name: FootBowling
description:
Football + Bowling inside a living room!

Made for Ludum Dare #37.

Instructions

1.Click on the ball to kick it. It will go on the opposite direction of where you hit it.

2. Hit objects with the ball to score points.

3. On the top right corner you can see how many tries you have. The game ends when you have no more tries left.

4. You can press ESC to pause (or resume) the game.

Credits

All models used are made by myself.

Sounds:
This game uses the following sound(s) from freesound.org:
65 High Timbale.wav by FranciscoPadilla ( https://www.freesound.org/people/FranciscoPadilla/ )

Music:
"BossaBossa"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
